channel.title: [Old School] Lost-Island [Delta]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/7086/lostisland.png[/img][/center]
[center]Lost Island[/center] [center][size=10pt]Lost Island is a Server That is strictly old school but not a rs remake, We just want to have an old server that looks fun and is fun, I would like the server to gradually grow.[/size][/center]
What this server features:
A unique home where training becomes a influential thing... Adding skilling zone for all skills, with very unique ideas for this, will not release any further info till later ;)
[size=24pt][b]MEDIA[/b][/size]
NPC's at home [img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/2998/npchome1.png[/img]
NPC's at Home [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/4545/npchome2.png[/img]
Where Shops Will be added: [img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/5537/shopsz.png[/img]
Starting Spot and Starter.... [img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/6052/startingareaandstarter.png[/img]
Shops Updated: [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2458/shopsadded.png[/img]
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/691/clancapes.png[/img]
[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/3943/drags.png[/img]
[img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/1083/generalqi.png[/img]
[img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/6551/rangesupplies.png[/img]
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/3561/rangey.png[/img]
[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4935/robes.png[/img]
Skilling Zone ( THANKS TO PKJADSCAPE or Pking4Fam )
[img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/5998/skillersarea.png[/img]
[center][size=18pt]Credits:[/size][/center] [size=20pt]iX Soulcist Xi for his wonderful clean base (bronze age) Pking4Fam for his skiller zone.[/size]
Client : http://uppit.com/fwh5iyzs2ou6/Client.rar
Source : http://uppit.com/0wenze6uonob/Source_Files.rar
[size=18pt] Download = Comment Please [/size]

item.title: [Old School] Lost-Island [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:57, topic:417947”]I’ve seen this source before. Not this exact one, I’m not saying you’ve leeched it. I’ve seen the original one, I just can’t remember the name. Do you remember, by any chance?[/quote]I used Bronze Age as the source, you may recognise it from server development section, but that was with the same name. PkJadScape is the skilling zone, I liked that one a lot and was really not bothered to create my own so yeah. Shops I took straight from an older server I had, so I’m not sure, tell me if any of those ring a bell.

Read full topic

item.title: [Old School] Lost-Island [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @ZIPO2012 ZIPO2012
item.description:
@ZIPO2012 wrote:

Mikeyzzz
Hi, i like your source/client, but i cant run it.
Windows XP SP3
Java Version 6 Update 30
JDK Version 6 Update 30
Environmental Variables for User:
CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin;

In your client run command:
@echo off
TITLE Run
start javaw -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0
exit

In your source server run command:
@echo off
title Bronze Age
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
@echo The server has started.

Please help me, what i need to do?

Read full topic

item.title: [Old School] Lost-Island [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

It didn’t save the text I put on for some reason, 2 secs

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:36, topic:417947”]have you guys even went on the server to see what it’s like…

yeah thought so.[/quote]

Want to get of my case? Not everyone likes the same goddamn things, I can tell from the pictures and information that I’ll hate it. Don’t tell me that it’s an oldschool and therefor it’s awesomely fun, I played servers back then but we’ve advanced a bit farther than this. I’d rather see some more things like 562s and 508s than more 317s that we don’t even need. I could care less if it’s oldschool, I don’t like it.

Read full topic
